plot: The story of the 1630 Charter colony in Massachusetts, and the struggle to retain the English Charter due to the colonist's determination to exercise religious freedom over the extreme opposition of the Church and Crown of England.
title: The Puritans
plot_es: The story of the 1630 Charter colony in Massachusetts, and the struggle to retain the English Charter due to the colonist's determination to exercise religious freedom over the extreme opposition of the Church and Crown of England.
plot_en: The story of the 1630 Charter colony in Massachusetts, and the struggle to retain the English Charter due to the colonist's determination to exercise religious freedom over the extreme opposition of the Church and Crown of England.
